headline: BofA lifts PANW, ZS targets, sees strong cybersecurity and network momentum
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America analyst Tal Liani said in a note on Monday that sentiment in the networking and cybersecurity sectors “should continue to support strong momentum,” as spending on AI infrastructure and enterprise security remains robust.

headline: Microsoft Expands Security Offering: Is it the Next Revenue Pillar?
summary: MSFT's security serves 1.5M customers, analyzing 100T signals daily with AI agents. Can automated threat detection become its next major revenue pillar?
